name: Ayush Tiwari
summary: Hi! I’m a software developer, exploring different fields of DevOps and try to contribute to open source.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.workplace: Logistics and Innovation Lab, IIT Madras
experience.description: Logistics labs ideates new algorithm and techniques to make the transportation of goods easier. I‘ve created the frontend interfaces as well as worked on integrating the backend to the frontend.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Implemented figma designs on a react native project.Created a styled PDF generator which collects the data from and send as PDF as styled in the figma file.

experience.title: App Developer
experience.description: Implemented Figma designs to the Resonect app. Also worked on the backend integration for the app.

projects.title: MobilePy
projects.description: This is an interpreter for python, which can be used in android set.

projects.title: Shooting 3D
projects.description: A single player 3D shooting game with brilliant graphics and animations.
